thing-type.label: Bambu Lab Printer
thing-type.description: Represents a Bambu Lab 3D printer connected via MQTT

channel.label: Nozzle Temperature
channel.description: Current temperature of the nozzle.

channel.label: Nozzle Target Temperature
channel.description: Target temperature of the nozzle.

channel.label: Bed Temperature
channel.description: Current temperature of the heated bed.

channel.label: Bed Target Temperature
channel.description: Target temperature of the heated bed.

channel.label: Chamber Temperature
channel.description: Current temperature inside the printer chamber.

channel.label: Print Stage
channel.description: Current stage of the print process.

channel.label: Print Progress
channel.description: Percentage of the print completed.

channel.label: Remaining Print Time
channel.description: Estimated time remaining for the print in seconds.

channel.label: WiFi Signal Strength
channel.description: Current WiFi signal strength.

channel.label: Bed Type
channel.description: Type of the printer's heated bed.

channel.label: G-code File
channel.description: Name of the currently loaded G-code file.

channel.label: G-code State
channel.description: Current state of the G-code execution.

channel.label: Pause/Stop Reason
channel.description: Reason for pausing or stopping the print.

channel.label: Print Result
channel.description: Final result or status of the print job.

channel.label: G-code Preparation Progress
channel.description: Percentage of G-code file preparation completed.

channel.label: Big Fan 1 Speed
channel.description: Speed of the first large cooling fan (RPM).

channel.label: Big Fan 2 Speed
channel.description: Speed of the second large cooling fan (RPM).

channel.label: Heat Break Fan Speed
channel.description: Speed of the heat break cooling fan (RPM).

channel.label: Current Layer Number
channel.description: Current layer being printed.

channel.label: time-lapse Enabled
channel.description: Indicates whether time-lapse recording is enabled.

channel.label: AMS System in Use
channel.description: Indicates whether the Automatic Material System (AMS) is active.

channel.label: Vibration Calibration
channel.description: Indicates whether vibration calibration has been performed.

channel.label: Camera Record
channel.description: Turns on/off openHAB's capability of recording.

channel.label: Chamber LED
channel.description: Controls the LED lighting inside the printer chamber.

channel.label: Work Area LED
channel.description: Controls the LED lighting for the work area.

parameter-group.name: camera
parameter-group.label: Camera
parameter-group.description: Properties for camera. Note: only A and P series are supported.

parameter.name: serial
parameter.label: Serial Number
parameter.description: Unique serial number of the printer.

parameter.name: hostname
parameter.label: Hostname
parameter.description: IP address of the printer or `us.mqtt.bambulab.com` for cloud mode.

parameter.name: accessCode
parameter.label: Access Code
parameter.description: Access code of the printer. The method of obtaining it differs for local and cloud modes.

parameter.name: username
parameter.label: Username
parameter.description: `bblp` for local mode or your Bambu Lab user (starts with `u_`).

parameter.name: cameraPort
parameter.label: Camera Port
parameter.description: Defaults to 6000 for A and P series.

parameter.name: cameraCertificate
parameter.label: TLS Certificate
parameter.description: To disable the use of your own certificate, enter none. If providing your own certificate, ensure it includes the header -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE----- at the beginning and -----END CERTIFICATE----- at the end.
